document_data.name: Lorthio Bukbukken
document_data.mainbody: '''Lorthio Bukbukken''' was a [[duergar]] alchemist in [[Gracklstugh]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Relationship: Lorthio had dealings with the corrupt [[Gorglak]].
document_data.Activities: Lorthio was an alchemist of [[Clan Bukbukken]] and a member of the [[Gray Ghosts]].
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], Lorthio was waiting for a delivery from [[Droki]].
